graph_title: 기부국가별 무역원조(Aid for Trade) 약정 및 지불 공식 금액 (2017년 기준 100만 고정 USD)
target_name: 개도국, 특히 최빈개도국에 대한 무역원조의 증가 (최빈개도국을 위한 무역관계 기술지원을 위한 강화된 통합프레임 하에서 이루어지는 원조를 포함)

en.target: Increase Aid for Trade support for developing countries, in particular least developed countries, including through the Enhanced Integrated Framework for Trade-related Technical Assistance to Least Developed Countries
en.indicator_name: Aid for Trade commitments and disbursements
en.national_indicator_description: This indicator is defined as gross disbursements and commitments of total Official Development Assistance (ODA)  from all donors for aid for trade.
en.national_indicator_available: Aid for Trade commitments and disbursements
en.un_custodian_agency: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)
en.global_metadata_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 208 KB)
en.goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 208 KB)
en.graph_title: Total official flows (commitments and disbursement) for Aid for Trade, by donor countries (millions of constant 2017 United States dollars)
en.title: Untitled
en.page_content: ▶ Data type: Estimated data by international organizations (Type2) This is Korean data prepared by international organizations through estimation and modeling. If there are no national data corresponding to UN SDGs indicators, international data are available for monitoring.
